posted for sale or free over the internet or offline you can sell items made from this pattern provided they are handmade by yourself in a limited number and you give credit to the designer please add the following lines to your item description and any item you are selling this item is handmade by your name from a design and pattern by megan lapp crafty intentions™ eu safety and compliance document 1 gdpr compliance statement this document accompanies the provided crochet pattern and ensures compliance with the general data protection regulation gdpr no personal data is collected stored or processed through the use of this pattern any data shared during the purchase or download of this pattern is handled in accordance with gdpr guidelines for more information please refer to the privacy policy of the platform used for the transaction these safety guidelines are provided to ensure compliance with the eu s general product safety regulation gpsr and promote the safe use of crafty intentions patterns 2 assurance of malicious code-free content the accompanying pdf crochet pattern has been thoroughly checked and is guaranteed to be free from malicious code viruses or any harmful software it is safe to download and use on your device this document may contain embedded links to websites and/or social media all links are to trusted sources but discretion is always advised when using links to external websites only download pattern files from trusted sources such as my shop on my website my shop on etsy and my shop on ravelry to ensure the integrity of the files 3 safe use of crochet tools and materials a crochet hook avoid using damaged or sharp crochet hooks to prevent injury b yarn ensure the yarn is free from knots or tangles before use keep yarn away from open flames or heat sources as some fibers may be flammable a if the finished item is intended for children or near to any kind of heat source it is recommended to use only natural fibers to reduce flammability and increase safety b if the item is intended for small children
